Name: Paradise Lost
About the game: Shooting games. Shoot monsters and have fun. Explore the map and discover the unknown. The world exists only for you. Monsters surround you and you need to survive in extreme environments Survival in a world of crisis and monsters is your main goal. Features of the game: Third person shooting Fast paced killing experience Use walk to avoid monster attacks Smooth and realistic attack feedback The vast map landscape can be explored A few monsters avoid too much killing Operation mode: W ↑ S ↓ A ← D → Shooting with the mouse
